text: For people who are afraid to take the #AstraZeneca’s #COVID19 #vaccine, I drew this tiny #dataviz in few seconds from an EMA press release. In light-green, people vaccinated without any issues. In orange, medical issues (CVST&SVT) and in red, deaths -as of 22 March 2021 [1/2]. ↘️ https://t.co/JVv7k3X5L3
